song_lyrics: Swāmī pragaṭ thayā te kahu sāmbhaḷo re, sādhu-janne alaukik svād;
Guṇ gāīe pavitra Dharma-vanshanā re... ṭek.
Jenī mātā Bhakti nāme mahāsatī re, pitā Pānḍe Hariprasād... Gun꠶ 1
Guṇavant Chhapaiyā ek gām chhe re, pāse Avadhya-nagar moṭu dhām... Gun꠶ 2
Chaitra shukla navamīe Prabhu janmiyā re, Harikṛuṣhṇa dharyu chhe shubh nām... Gun꠶ 3
Bāḷ-līlā kare chhe bahu bhātnī re, māta-pitāne harakh na māy... Gun꠶ 4
Vahālo chandra-kaḷānī pere vadhatā re, nar-nārī joine sukhī thāy... Gun꠶ 5
Āṭh varṣhe pāmyā te upavitne re, tajyu bhuvan āṇīne vairāg... Gun꠶ 6
Guṇ charitra Manohar gāvavā re, maḷyo Brahmānandne māg... Gun꠶ 7
title: Swāmī pragaṭ thayā te kahu sāmbhaḷo re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1101: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
